topbar.confirmDeleteAllDesc: Are you sure you want to delete all notes? This will permanently delete all your notes and cannot be undone.

notes.emptyDescription: Start by creating your first note to organize your thoughts and ideas.

common.confirmDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.
common.confirmDeleteAllDesc: Are you sure you want to delete ALL notes? This will permanently delete all your notes and cannot be undone.
